org.usfirst.frc.team263.robot

Class VisionProcessing

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team263.robot.VisionProcessing

  • public class VisionProcessing
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for vision processing. Receives points representing the center of two contours from the RPi and finds the distance from the corresponding target.
    Since:
    01-18-17
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Tyler Machado

      • findStrafeDistancePeg

        public double findStrafeDistancePeg(double[] nums)
        Given the distance away from the peg and letting rotation be perpendicular to the peg, can calculate the distance needed to strafe in order to center the peg in the camera
        Parameters:
        nums - X and Y values of points
        Returns:
        Distance to strafe for peg (inches)
